EmailTemplate.subject: Senior College Tour 12 June, 2018: Make your final school years count!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
I'm delighted to invite you along to our upcoming Senior College Tour on Tuesday 12 June. It's a fantastic opportunity for you and your child to visit the School, tour the facilities, meet our Year 12 leaders and Senior College staff. Details below.
Bookings are essential. Please book your place via our website at http://www.sacs.nsw.edu.au/tourselect/1096.
I look forward to welcoming you on the day.
Regards
Bruce Perry
Registrar

Step up into our Senior College
Independence - Flexibility - Real-world Learning
Make your final school years count in a learning environment that provides you with amazing choice
Dynamic, coeducational environment in the heart of Sydney's CBD; Greater independence and more responsibility; Diverse learning options and subject choices through HSC or IB; Global learning through interactive technologies and international educational tours.
Tuesday 12 June, 2018
9:00am to 10.30am
St Andrew's House, Sydney Square, Sydney
Bookings: https://www.sacs.nsw.edu.au/book-a-tour/tour-bookings/
Come along and see for yourself what makes our city school so special. Reserve a place on our Senior College Tour and find out first hand from student guides what St Andrew's can offer.
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
